description: Key flight metrics from the last 30 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (SELECT flight_count FROM flight_analytics_daily WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE) as "Flights Today",
  (SELECT SUM(flight_count) FROM flight_analytics_daily WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - 7) as "Flights (7d)",
  (SELECT SUM(flight_count) FROM flight_analytics_daily WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30) as "Flights (30d)",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aircraft_analytics WHERE flight_count_7d > 0) as "Active Aircraft (7d)",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aircraft_analytics WHERE z_score_30d > 3.0) as "Anomalous Aircraft"

title: Flight Analytics Summary
